lead_paragraph: David Reutimann, a Nascar Craftsman Truck Series regular this season, will move up to the Nextel Cup series in 2007 with the Michael Waltrip Racing team. He will join Waltrip and Dale Jarrett on the three-car Toyota team.
snippet: David Reutimann, a Nascar Craftsman Truck Series regular this season, will move up to the Nextel Cup series in 2007 with the Michael Waltrip Racing team. He will join Waltrip and Dale Jarrett on the three-car Toyota team.
